column2: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Mainly fair weather will prevail over the sea areas around the island.

column1: Winds  will  be  easterly  or  north-easterly

column2: Kankasanthurai to Matara via Trincomalee, Pottuvil and Hambantota, and winds will be variable
in direction in the other sea areas around the island. wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
The sea areas around the island will be slight to moderate.
